**The Report Publisher**

The report was published by the **Marketing Development Department**, as indicated at the bottom of the page: "PUBLISHED BY THE MARKETING DEVELOPMENT DEPARTMENT." This department is associated with R.J. Reynolds Tobacco USA, located in Winston-Salem, North Carolina (N.C.), with the address: R.J. REYNOLDS TOBACCO USA, WINSTON-SALEM, N.C. 27102.

This information is found on the final line of the document, under the title "CONFIDENTIAL Product Research Report". The document also includes the date "May 3, 1989" and the names of the people who copied and filed it, further confirming the context within which it was published.
